common.template.cms.local

Class LocalCmsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.template.cms.local.LocalCmsService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmsService

    @Singleton
public final class LocalCmsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmsService
    Service that provides content data from i18n files that can be found locally. It uses a I18nResolver internally to resolve the requested messages. The mapping of the CmsService parameters to I18nResolver parameters goes as follows: - bundle = contentType (e.g. banner) - key = contentId.field (e.g. homeTopLeft.subtitle) The pageKey is then ignored as its only purpose is for remote access.
